name: fzf-js
description: Demo of compiling fzf-lib to something to use in the browser

scripts.build-go: mkdir -p lib/go && (cd src && GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -o ../lib/go/main.wasm) && tsc --outDir lib/go/ && cp $(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js lib/go/fzf-js.js && cat src/example.html | sed 's/##TITLE##/Go WASM target/' > lib/go/example.html
scripts.build-tinygo: export TARGETDIR=lib/tinygo; mkdir -p ${TARGETDIR} && (cd src && tinygo build -target=wasm -opt 2 -o ../${TARGETDIR}/main.wasm) && tsc --outDir ${TARGETDIR}/ && cp $(tinygo env TINYGOROOT)/targets/wasm_exec.js ${TARGETDIR}/fzf-js.js && cat src/example.html | sed 's/##TITLE##/TinyGo WASM target/' > ${TARGETDIR}/example.html
scripts.build-gopherjs: export TARGETDIR=lib/gopherjs; mkdir -p ${TARGETDIR} && tsc --outDir ${TARGETDIR}/ && (cd src && ~/go/bin/gopherjs build . -o ../${TARGETDIR}/fzf-js.js) && cat src/example.html | sed 's/##TITLE##/Gopherjs/' > ${TARGETDIR}/example.html

author: Claud-Apps
